response.text: Verily he [i.e., Jesus) is a portent of the Hour.
(Jesus had said): "Indeed Allah is my Lord and your Lord, so serve Him alone.
Believers, become Allah's helpers, as Jesus, son of Mary, said to the disciples: “Who is my helper in (calling people) to Allah?”
This is Jesus, the son of Mary; and this is the truth about him concerning which they are in doubt.
And when Jesus perceived their leaning towards unbelief, he asked: 'Who will be my helpers in the way of Allah?'

metadata.name: description
metadata.value: English translation of Quran based on Khalid Ansari's interpritation

summary.text: Jesus, also known as the son of Mary, is a significant figure in various religious beliefs. He is regarded as a portent of the Hour [1] and has proclaimed Allah as his Lord [2]. Jesus called upon believers to serve Allah alone [2] and asked for helpers in spreading the message of Allah [3][5]. The truth about Jesus is a subject of doubt and discussion [4]. His teachings and actions have left an impact on the followers of different faiths [3]. Please note that the search results provided limited information, and for a more comprehensive understanding of Jesus, it is recommended to explore additional sources.
